name: Shelve it!
description:
Hurry up and start shelving before your boss comes back and sees you slacking. If you fail... you're fired!

Instructions:

Use left click to drag items.

Music:

Pretty Maiden - https://opengameart.org/users/mageonduty

Video Game Cheerful Ending - https://opengameart.org/users/almitory

Shopping Theme - https://opengameart.org/users/nlhoang162
